name: The More The Bloodier
description:
THE MORE THE BLOODIER! Fight your way through a horde of deadly gladiators

In "The More THe Bloodier" you play as an unkown fighter who's visiting the arena for the first time. You have to slay gladiators to gain their respect. However, be aware that for each gladiator you slay, your reputation will rise and you'll become a target to destroy for fame. As more and more gladiators arrive for your head you'll have to display immense fighting skill to be able to go down as a legend.
